item.title: Getting Started with .NET Core and VS Code

In this article, we will install .

item.title: Introduction to .NET Core
item.description: Table of Contents What is .NET Core? Scenarios for .NET Core .NET Standard - One library to rule them all Tools Conclusion What is .NET Core? .NET Core is a general purpose development platform maintained by Microsoft and the .NET community on GitHub. It is cross-platform, supporting Windows, macOS and Linux, and can be used in device, cloud, and embedded/IoT scenarios. The following characteristics best define .
